Bash(gh issue create --title "ETL Debug: Docker PostgreSQL Infrastructure" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
Set up Docker infrastructure for local PostgreSQL debugging environment with 4-schema architecture.

## Background
Enable phase-by-phase ETL debugging by storing intermediate data in local PostgreSQL rather than just CSV files.

## Tasks
- [ ] Create `docker/docker-compose.yml` with PostgreSQL 16 container
- [ ] Create `docker/init/01_schemas.sql` to initialize 4 schemas \(raw, stage, intermediate, datamart\)
- [ ] Create `docker/init/02_functions.sql` with helper functions \(row counts, table lists\)
- [ ] Create `config/debug_config.ini` with connection settings
- [ ] Create `data/debug/` directory for state files

## Schema Architecture
| Schema | Purpose | When Populated |
|--------|---------|----------------|
| `raw` | Original source data | Phase 1 \(BLB tables, tracking data\) |
| `stage` | Intermediate transformations | Phases 2-4 \(enhanced events/shifts\) |
| `intermediate` | Calculation-ready data | Phases 5-9 \(stats, analytics\) |
| `datamart` | Final tables \(mirrors Supabase\) | Phases 10-11 \(all dim_*, fact_*, qa_*\) |

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] `docker-compose up` starts PostgreSQL on localhost:5432
- [ ] All 4 schemas exist after container start
- [ ] Config file contains correct connection settings
- [ ] Container persists data across restarts

## Labels
enhancement, etl, infrastructure
EOF
\)" --label "enhancement")
